short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best tool to track your students engagement on Google meet, dark mode, download XLSX, CSV
short.es: La mejor herramienta para seguir la participacion de tus alumnos en Google Meet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track your students attendance and engagement in an easy way.
No registration process.
Dark Mode, Download csv, XLSX.
long.es:
Your sidekick on online classes! 

Simple and easy to use!

No registration process.

Track how your students engage with your classes, take attendance, receive chat notifications,  mute them all if necessary,  give them positive marks, know how many words each of them has said and track for how long your students participate.  

We are here to make online classes more interactive for you and your students  upgrading the best tool on the market, Google meet.
